queries.name: show Media
queries.description: toon alle records in de tabel dbtable_media

queries.name: show Media_New
queries.description: toon alle records in de tabel dbtable_media_new

queries.name: Fill Media_New table
queries.query: INSERT INTO Media_New SELECT * FROM Media

queries.name: Show duplicate media with same hash in Media_new
queries.query: SELECT * FROM Media_new WHERE hash IN (SELECT hash FROM Media GROUP BY hash HAVING COUNT(*) > 1)
